circumstances: During the takeoff roll at Nakhchivan Airport, at a speed of 230 km/h, the crew encountered an unexpected situation and decided to abort. The aircraft veered off runway and collided with a concrete parapet, bursting into flames. A crew member and four passengers were injured while 29 other occupants were killed.
probable_cause: For unknown reasons, all four speed levers went to idle during the takeoff roll.
